content: --पक्ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} like, similar. (--क्षः {1} the opposite side, party or faction, hostility. {2} an adversary, enemy, foe, rival; प्रतिपक्षकामिनी ‘a rival wife’; <ls>Bv. 2. 64</ls>; <ls>Vikr. 1. 70</ls>, <ls n="Vikr. 1.">73</ls>; प्रतिपक्षमशक्तेन प्रतिकर्तुं <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; often used in <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘equal’ or ‘similar’. {3} a defendant or respondent (in law).
